snippet: The transformation of Ashraf Ghani into something akin to an Afghan populist is perhaps the most surprising story line in the Afghan presidential campaign.
abstract: Afghan presidential candidate Ashraf Ghani has transformed himself from technocrat to man of the people; former finance minister has leavened his usual talk of detailed economic plans with statements about Afghans’ will to resist all who seek to oppress them, from Pakistan to the Taliban to the United States.
lead_paragraph: The transformation of Ashraf Ghani into something akin to an Afghan populist is perhaps the most surprising story line in the Afghan presidential campaign.

headline.main: Technocrat to Afghan Populist, Ashraf Ghani Is Transformed
headline.print_headline: Technocrat to Populist, an Afghan Transformed
